name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Lead Android Engineer with over 8 years of experience in high-performance mobile application development, specializing in **Android**, **Kotlin**, and **Java**. Proficient in Agile methodologies and adept at designing and implementing **RESTful APIs**, alongside extensive experience with **third-party integrations**. I have a solid understanding of architectural patterns including **MVC**, **MVVM**, and **MVP**, ensuring adherence to coding standards and best practices. 

In addition to my technical expertise, I possess strong technical leadership skills, having successfully led teams to deliver robust applications under tight deadlines. My background includes building solutions for healthcare and financial sectors, integrating industry-standard compliance protocols. Leveraging my experience in various frameworks and tools, I aim to drive innovation and enhance performance within teams and projects.
